0xFF44780E.name: DRAW_CORONA

params.name: posX
params.description: The X position of the corona origin.

params.name: posY
params.description: The Y position of the corona origin.

params.name: posZ
params.description: The Z position of the corona origin.

params.name: red
params.description: The red component of the marker color, on a scale from 0-255.

params.name: green
params.description: The green component of the marker color, on a scale from 0-255.

params.name: blue
params.description: The blue component of the marker color, on a scale from 0-255.

params.name: alpha
params.description: The alpha component of the marker color, on a scale from 0-255.

params.name: zBias
params.description: zBias slightly shifts the depth of surfaces to make sure they donâ€™t overlap or cause visual glitches when they are very close together. The zBias value are usually in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.

params.name: dirX
params.description: The X direction of the corona.

params.name: dirY
params.description: The Y direction of the corona.

params.name: dirZ
params.description: The Z direction of the corona.

params.name: viewThreshold
params.description: The view threshold is to determine the fading of the corona based on the distance.

params.name: innerAngle
params.description: The inner angle of the corona.

params.name: outerAngle
params.description: The outer angle of the corona.

0xFF44780E.description: Allows drawing advanced light effects, known as coronas, which support flares, volumetric lighting, and customizable glow properties.

examples.code:
local pedCoords = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
Citizen.CreateThread(function()
    while true do
        DrawCorona(pedCoords.x, pedCoords.y, pedCoords.z, 5.0, 255, 255, 255, 255, 4.0, 0.2, pedCoords.x, pedCoords.y, pedCoords.z, 1.0, 0.0, 90.0, 2)
        Wait(0)
    end
end)
